sectionText: Topic Section INT: Internship Seminar  The study of literature and language is an asset in the workplace.  English majors currently completing internships are eligible to take this seminar to explore pathways from their academic work to success beyond college.  Through regular meetings and short but rigorous weekly writing assignments, students will envision and research individual career trajectories, begin building networks to support those plans, and create meaningful connections between their internships, their classes, and their postgraduation goals. DEPARTMENTAL APPROVAL is needed to enroll.
